title: Help with Font
content:
This is a Norwegian Lyrics, but i need to know what font is used here.  
Does anyone know?

Font: 

 No 

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_4768.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143801/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_4768.jpg) | 113.64 KB |
author: ailinn03

comments.content:
2 fonts actually:

"Familie" must be **[Zapfino](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143801/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Zapfino%20Forte%20LT%20Pro%20-%20Regular&fid=8dd132e50c94970f9d4b7c49db32a69b&fsize=60&text=Familie&fit=1)** by Linotype - probably Zapfino Extra

while the smaller text ("Tina", "Daniel", etc) looks like **[Amazone](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143801/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Amazone%20BT%20-%20Regular&fid=b34ea6e4cdd617101fed842bdadba46c&fsize=60&text=Tina%20Daniel%20Endre%20Tobias%20Alt%20fordi&wrap=2)** by Leonard H. D. Smit (1958) available from Linotype & Tilde  
(The latter was also digitized by Dan X. Solo as "Amapola")

------------------  
I found them using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143801/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
